delete.title: Delete Contest
delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this contest? This action cannot be undone.

archive.title: Archive Contest
archive.confirm: Are you sure you want to archive this contest? It will be moved to the archive list.

hero.antiCheatEnabled: This exam has anti-cheat mode enabled. Please read the following rules carefully:
hero.keepFullscreen: Please keep fullscreen mode during the exam.
hero.noSwitchTabs: Switching tabs or windows is prohibited and will be recorded.
hero.maxWarnings: If violations exceed {{count}} times, your exam will be automatically locked.
hero.enterFullscreenOnStart: Click "Confirm Start" to enter fullscreen mode.
hero.confirmSubmitQuestion: Are you sure you want to end the exam and submit?
hero.noMoreAnswer: After submitting, you cannot answer anymore and this action cannot be undone. Please confirm you have completed all problems.
hero.nicknameHint: You can change your nickname displayed on the scoreboard at any time.
hero.updateFailed: Update failed, please try again later
hero.privateContestHint: This is a private contest. Please enter the password to join.
hero.anonymousModeHint: Anonymous mode is enabled. You can set a nickname. The scoreboard and submission list will display your nickname instead of your real account.
hero.leaveBlankForDefault: Leave blank to use default account name
hero.canChangeNicknameLater: You can change your nickname after registration.

avatar.updateFailed: Failed to update nickname, please try again later

overview.examModeDesc: This contest has exam mode enabled. Monitoring will be activated upon entering, including fullscreen lock and tab switch detection. Violations will be recorded and may result in answer lock.
overview.downloadDesc: Download all contest problems (PDF or Markdown format)

problemManage.title: Problem Management
problemManage.addHint: Enter problem ID (from library) or problem title (create new).
problemManage.orCreateNew: Or create a new blank problem
problemManage.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove this problem from the contest?
problemManage.addFailed: Failed to add problem, please check ID or title

monitor.title: Exam Monitoring
monitor.antiCheatEnabled: Anti-cheat monitoring is enabled for this exam
monitor.noWindowBlur: Minimizing window or switching to other applications is prohibited
monitor.warningMessage: Violations will be recorded. Exceeding the limit will result in automatic lock and you cannot continue the exam.

download.title: Download Contest File
download.description: Download the complete contest file including contest information, all problems, and their descriptions as a PDF-ready package.
download.scaleHint: Adjust font and content size of PDF output. 100% is original size.

exitModal.teacherAdminExit: Are you sure you want to leave the contest management page?
exitModal.studentNotJoined: Are you sure you want to leave the contest page?
exitModal.autoSubmitWarning: After leaving, the system will auto-submit for you and you cannot answer anymore.
exitModal.confirmSubmitAndExitQuestion: Are you sure you want to submit and exit?

submissions.title: Submissions
submissions.subtitle: View all public code submissions and results.

standings.title: Live Standings
standings.icpcRules: ICPC Rules: Rankings are based on number of problems solved first, then total penalty time (solve time + 20 min per wrong attempt).

exam.antiCheatStarting: Anti-cheat monitoring will start after countdown
exam.doNotSwitchTabs: Do not switch tabs or leave window
exam.canViewButNoAnswer: You can view standings or submissions, but cannot continue answering
exam.stayInExamPage: Please stay on the exam page and maintain fullscreen mode.
exam.examLocked: Your exam has been locked! Please contact the proctor.
exam.zeroChanceWarning: If remaining chances reach zero, you will be auto-locked!
exam.examUnlockedDesc: The proctor has lifted your lock. Click "Continue Exam" to re-enter exam mode.
exam.followRulesReminder: Reminder: Please follow exam rules to avoid being locked again.
exam.leaveFullscreenWillSubmit: Leaving fullscreen in exam mode will be treated as submission.
exam.autoSubmitNoMoreAnswer: After confirming, the system will auto-submit for you and you cannot answer anymore.

settings.title: Contest Settings
settings.showDuringContestHelp: Allow participants to view live scoreboard during contest
settings.anonymousModeHelp: When enabled, participants can set nicknames. Scoreboard and submission list will display nicknames
settings.confirmArchive: Are you sure you want to archive this contest?
settings.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this contest? This action cannot be undone!
settings.exportResultsDesc: Export contest results as CSV file, including rank, account, solved problems, total score, and problem status.
settings.archiveDesc: Once archived, the contest will become read-only and cannot be activated again.
settings.deleteDesc: This action cannot be undone. All related data (including submissions and rankings) will be permanently deleted.
